name: From Scratch
description:
In FROM SCRATCH you explore a large open world (two maps the first one with an area of over 50 square kilometers, the second one with an area of 16 square kilometers), in which you will discover many interesting places (port, mines, warehouses, military outpost and others).

You will fight, craft, trade, mine, fight enemies and hunt animals.

You start almost from scratch, with a basic backpack and clothes.
You can set up your base in one of the abandoned houses or build your base, store your loot in a crafted chest and decorate it with various furniture and props that you can buy from the seller.

Craft equipment from gathered resources to prepare for the dangers that lurk in the unknown.
Craft a variety of items, from basic items to advanced items such as weapons and more!

Smelt raw materials to sell them later and use the collected money to buy equipment that you cannot produce.

Fight using melee weapons, firearms and grenades.

Don't forget to collect the plants that exist in the world.
